mapper.insert: insert into log (ip, platform_type,page, ip_city, create_time, browser, action, action_object,action_desc) values (#{ip},#{platformType}, #{page}, #{ipCity}, now(), #{browser}, #{action}, #{actionObject},#{actionDesc})
mapper.select: select count(distinct ip) as todayIpCount, count(*) as todayPvCount from log where create_time >= curdate()
select count(distinct ip) as totalIpCount, count(*) as totalPvCount from log

SELECT ip AS ip, GROUP_CONCAT( concat(action,action_object,action_desc) ORDER BY create_time SEPARATOR '+' ) actions, MAX(ip_city) ipCity, MAX(browser) browser, TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND, MIN(create_time),MAX(create_time)) stayTime, DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL #{start} DAY) as day, time(MAX(create_time)) leaveTime, time(MIN(create_time)) entryTime FROM log WHERE create_time >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL #{start} DAY) AND create_time < DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL #{end} DAY) GROUP BY ip,DATE(create_time) ORDER BY entryTime desc

SELECT DATE(create_time) day, count(DISTINCT ip) ip, count(1) pv FROM log WHERE create_time > DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL #{days} DAY) AND create_time < DATE_ADD(CURDATE(),INTERVAL 1 DAY) GROUP BY DATE(create_time)
SELECT DATE(created_at) day, count(1) register FROM user WHERE created_at > DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL #{days} DAY) AND created_at < DATE_ADD(CURDATE(),INTERVAL 1 DAY) GROUP BY DATE(created_at)
SELECT group_concat(DISTINCT ip_city) citys FROM log WHERE create_time > DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL #{days} DAY) AND create_time < DATE_ADD(CURDATE(),INTERVAL 1 DAY)

select COUNT(case when browser="PC" then 1 END) pcNum, COUNT(case when browser="Mobile" then 1 END) mobileNum FROM( SELECT ip, Max(browser) browser FROM log WHERE create_time > DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL #{days} DAY) AND create_time < DATE_ADD(CURDATE(),INTERVAL 1 DAY) GROUP BY ip ) a

SELECT COUNT(case when (page="首页" && action_desc="") then 1 end) 博文, COUNT(case when page="文章详情页" then 1 end) 文章详情页, COUNT(case when (page="留言页" && action_desc="") then 1 end) 留言, COUNT(case when (page="时间轴" && action_desc="") then 1 end) 时间轴, COUNT(case when (page="关于" && action_desc="") then 1 end) 关于, COUNT(case when (page="访问统计" && action_desc="") then 1 end) 访问统计, COUNT(case when (page="开放式后台" && action_desc="") then 1 end) 开放式后台 FROM log WHERE create_time > DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL #{days} DAY) AND create_time < DATE_ADD(CURDATE(),INTERVAL 1 DAY)
